main.name: Pratik S. Sutar
main.bio: Software Developer with 3.2 years of experience in ASP.NET Core, C#, SQL Server, JavaScript. Skilled in AWS (EC2, S3, IAM, VPC, CloudWatch) and DevOps tools like Docker, Terraform, and Git for CI/CD automation, Kubernetes

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my skill sets

experience.title: Associate Consultant
experience.responsibilities:
Technologies Used - ASP.NET Core, C#, SSMS, SQL, Angular 14+, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Linux, AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, CodePipeline), Terraform, Docker. 
Developed and maintained 3 live enterprise web applications, ensuring high availability and performance. 
Collaborated with senior developers to enhance UI components using Angular and update APIs in ASP.NET Core. 
Handled bug fixing, change requests, and minor feature development across backend (C#, SQL Server). 
Wrote and optimized SQL queries and stored procedures to resolve data issues. 
Managed infrastructure provisioning using Terraform to define and deploy AWS resources. 
Containerized application components using Docker and integrated deployment into the AWS CodePipeline CI/CD process. 
Automated operational tasks and monitoring scripts using Python to enhance system stability and maintenance. 
Participated in code reviews, unit testing, and performed deployments in a Linux server environment
experience.achievements:
Accelerated Deployment Cycle by implementing Docker containerization and integrating automated deployment workflows using AWS CodePipeline and CodeBuild, resulting in faster, more reliable releases.
 Reduced Infrastructure Drift by utilizing Terraform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC), successfully defining and managing core AWS resources (EC2, RDS, Networking) across multiple application environments. 
Enhanced Application Performance by developing queries/stored procedures, resolving data issues. 
Contributed to High Availability by performing consistent support and managing bug fixes and change requests efficiently.

experience.company: Rexx Media Pvt Ltd, Jan 2021 - June 2021 (Internship)
experience.title: Mobile Application Developer Intern
experience.responsibilities:
Technologies Used - Flutter , Dart. 
Developed and maintained mobile applications using Flutter and Dart, enhancing user experience with responsive and visually appealing interfaces.
Collaborated with senior developers to design and implement new features, including user authentication, push notifications, and data synchronization. 
Conducted unit tests and participated in code reviews to ensure high-quality code and application performance.
experience.achievements: Learned and gained knowledge of Flutter framework and Dart Language.
